name: Lucifron
rules: FRONT: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the start of your third turn, flip Lucifron.; BACK: Lucifron has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, Lucifron deals 6 shadow damage to each opposing hero.

name: Magmadar
rules: FRONT: Magmadar has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, flip Magmadar.; BACK: Magmadar has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1, Exhaust a Hunter in your party -> Flip Magmadar. Any player may use this power during that player's turn.

name: Gehennas
rules: FRONT: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.; At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 3 shadow damage to target opposing hero chosen at random. That hero's controller discards a card. Flip Gehennas.; BACK: Gehennas has +2 ATK while attacking and can only attack heroes.; At the end of your turn, Gehennas deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally. Flip Gehennas.

name: Garr
rules: FRONT: Garr has +3 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of each turn, if you have four or fewer Firesworn, flip Garr.; BACK: Garr has +6 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1 -> Destroy one of your Firesworn. If you do, it deals 2 fire damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party.

name: Baron Geddon
rules: FRONT: When Baron Geddon enters play, each opponent destroys all but five of his resources.; At the end of your turn, Baron Geddon deals 1 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally for each resource you have.; [Exhaust] -> Flip Baron Geddon.; BACK: Destroy Baron Geddon -> Baron Geddon deals 12 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. Use only if Baron Geddon has 12 or more damage.

name: Shazzrah
rules: FRONT: Shazzrah has +2 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; 1 -> Flip Shazzrah. Use only once per turn.; BACK: When Shazzrah flips to this side, drop him from at least three feet above play. He deals 5 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally he lands on.; At the start of your turn, flip Shazzrah.

name: Sulfuron Harbinger
rules: FRONT: Sulfuron Harbinger has +4 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; [Exhaust] -> Flip Sulfuron Harbinger. Use only on your turn.; BACK: Sulfuron Harbinger has +8 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.

name: Golemagg the Incinerator
rules: FRONT: Golemagg has +5 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; At the end of your turn, Golemagg deals 3 fire damage to target opposing hero or ally.; At the start of your turn, if Golemagg has 15 or more damage, flip him.; BACK: Golemagg has +5 while attacking and can attack only heroes.; When Golemagg is dealt damage, he deals 5 melee damage to the source of that damage.

name: Majordomo Executus
rules: FRONT: At the start of your turn, flip a coin. If it's heads, prevent all damage that would be dealt by opposing allies until your next turn. If it's tails, destroy all abilities attached to your allies and prevent all damage that would be dealt with opposing abilities until your next turn.; At the end of each turn, if you have no allies, flip Majordomo Executus.; BACK: When Majordomo Executus flips to this side, say, Behold Ragnaros-the Firelord! He who was ancient when this world was young! Bow before him, mortals! Bow before your ending! Ragnaros awakens.

name: Ragnaros
rules: FRONT: Untargetable; Ragnaros can't be dealt damage. You can't play or discard cards.; At the start of your turn, flip Ragnaros.; BACK: Ragnaros has +10 ATK while attacking and can attack only heroes.; Ragnaros can't be dealt fire damage. At the end of your turn, if you have exactly three resources, put eight Sons of Flame into play and flip Ragnaros.

name: Rune of Kress
rules: At the end of your turn, roll a die.; 1: Nothing happens.; 2-3: Magmadar deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in a party of your choice.; 4-5: Magmadar deals 3 fire damage to an opposing hero or ally.; 6: Each opponent puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

name: Rune of Mohn
rules: Opposing heroes and allies can't be healed.

name: Rune of Blaz
rules: At the end of your turn, destroy all opposing abilities.

name: Rune of Zeth
rules: At the start of your turn, if a hero is The Bomb, Baron Geddon deals 5 fire damage to that hero and each ally in its party.; At the end of your turn, choose an opposing hero to be The Bomb until the end of your next turn.

name: Rune of Mazj
rules: When an opponent plays an ability card, interrupt it.

name: Rune of Koro
rules: Opposing allies have -2 ATK.

name: Rune of Theri
rules: Your Core Ragers can't be destroyed or otherwise leave your control while your hero is Golemagg.; When Golemagg is destroyed, remove all of your Core Ragers from the game.

name: Ashes to Ashes
rules: Each opponent chooses an ally in his party and removes it from the game. If your hero is Majordomo Executus, you choose instead.; Ongoing: When an ally is destroyed, remove it from the game.
flavour: You think you've won already? Perhaps you'll need another lesson in pain!

name: Flame Burst
rules: Each opponent destroys one of his resources.
flavour: In the depth of the Molten Core, you're well advised to watch your step.

name: Flames of the Incinerator
rules: Attach to target opposing hero or ally, and your hero deals 3 fire damage to it.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 fire damage to attached character, or 4 damage if your hero is Golemagg.

name: Gehennas's Shadowbolt
rules: Your hero deals 4 shadow damage to target opposing hero or ally. If your hero is Gehennas, each opponent discards a card.

name: Hotter Than Goo
rules: Destroy all of target opponent's abilities, allies, and equipment.
flavour: Even the steaming goo that flows in Hive'Ashi won't melt thorium. I'm getting out of here! - Savin Lightguard

name: Inspire
rules: You may flip your hero.; If your hero is Sulfuron Harbinger, you may ready him.

name: Lava Pool
rules: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment.
flavour: Someone always falls into the lava.

name: Lava Spit
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target opposing ally. If your hero is Magmadar, he also deals 2 fire damage to each other hero and ally in that ally's party.
flavour: When a dog drools molten rock, slobbering is deadly.

name: Living Bomb
rules: Attach to target opposing ally.; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy attached ally. If your hero is Baron Geddon, that ally deals fire damage equal to ist cost to each other hero and ally in ist party.
flavour: RUN!

name: Lucifron's Curse
rules: Choose one: Destroy target ability; or interrupt target ability card. If your hero is Lucifron, you may choose both.
flavour: The curse so sapped his strength that it took all of his will just to swing his sword.

name: Magma Shackles
rules: Attach to target ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step. While your hero is Garr, each ally in that ally's party can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Shazzrah's Arcane Explosion
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party. If your hero is Shazzrah, draw three cards.

name: Tight Quarters
rules: Destroy target equipment.
flavour: Hold on to your weapons tightly! If you drop something, we're not going looking for it.

name: Unexpected Distraction
rules: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target hero or ally this turn.
flavour: I told you to move out of the imp cave!

name: Volcanic Lair
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, if you have five or more resources, destroy target opposing hero.
flavour: Even the hardiest of adventurers can only spend so long in the fiery bowels of Blackrock Mountain.

name: Ancient Core Hound
rules: When Ancient Core Hound enters play, roll a die.; 1-2: Exhaust all opposing allies.; 3-4: Ancient Core Hound deals 2 fire damage to each ally in a party of your choice.; 5-6: Put an opposing ally into ist owner's hand.
flavour: These great beasts of lava roam the whole of the Molten Core.

name: Firelord
rules: When Firelord enters play, put a Lava Spawn into play.
flavour: The first thing eager raiders learn about the Molten Core is the importance of keeping lava spawns under control.

name: Flame Imps
flavour: Seemingly endless packs of flame imps lie in wait for those who seek to venture into Magmadar Cavern.

name: Lava Annihilator
rules: When Lava Annihilator enters play, you may destroy target ally.
flavour: They don't respond well to taunts. Believe me, I've tried. - Victoria Jaton

name: Lava Pack
rules: When Lava Pack enters play, put the top card of the Minion deck into play as an ally.
flavour: The only thing worse than a ball of living flame is four of them. - Grumpherys

name: Lava Surger
rules: When Lava Surger deals combat damage to a hero, ready Lava Surger. It can't attack that hero this turn.
flavour: These elementals surge about randomly, knocking around those unfortunate enough to stand in their path.

name: Molten Destroyer
rules: Raid Destroyer has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.
flavour: Molten destroyers are the stronger, tougher brethren of the molten giants. They stand guard deeper in the Molten Core.

name: Molten Giants
rules: Raid Giants has +1 ATK and +1 health for each rune you have.
flavour: These massive creatures are the first sight greeting those who find their way from Blackrock Depths into the Molten Core.

name: BY FIRE BE PURGED
rules: Choose two: Destroy all opposing abilities; destroy all opposing allies; or destroy all opposing equipment.
flavour: Nowhere in the Firelord's lair is safe from the flames.

name: DIE, INSECT!
rules: Ongoing: When an opposing ally is destroyed, draw a card.; When an opposing hero is destroyed, draw a card for each rune you have.

name: Elemental Fire
rules: When a hero or ally deals damage to Ragnaros this turn, Ragnaros deals that much fire damage to each hero and ally in that character's party.

name: Flames of Sulfuron
rules: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally for each rune you have.
flavour: TASTE THE FLAMES OF SULFURON!

name: Flaming Assault
rules: Ready Ragnaros.

name: Fury of the Firelord
rules: Ragnaros deals 50 fire damage to each opposing hero and ally. That damage can't be prevented.; Fury of the Firelord can't be interrupted.
flavour: When Emperor Thaurissan called upon a powerful elemental to aid him in the War of the Three Hammers, he knew not what power he would awaken.

name: Hammer of Ragnaros
rules: Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment. Its controller destroys another one of his abilities, allies, or equipment.
flavour: The mighty hammer came down with such force that nothing could have survived.

name: Lava Splash
rules: Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to each hero and ally in target player's party for each rune you have.

name: Magma Blast
rules: Ongoing: At the end of each opponent's turn, if Ragnaros isn't Submerged and was dealt no damage this turn, Ragnaros deals 1 fire damage to that player's hero for each rune you have.

name: Melt Weapon
rules: Destroy all of target opponent's equipment.
flavour: Playing with fire has a price.

name: NOW FOR YOU, INSECTS!
rules: Interrupt target ability, ally, or equipment card.
flavour: BOLDLY, YOU SOUGHT THE POWER OF RAGNAROS. NOW YOU SHALL SEE IT FIRSTHAND!

name: Unstoppable Flame
rules: This turn, Ragnaros has +X ATK, is untargetable, and can't be protected against.

name: Wrath of Ragnaros
rules: Destroy target ally. Ragnaros deals fire damage equal to that ally's cost to a hero in that ally's party.

name: Firesworn
rules: When Firesworn is dealt fatal damage, it deals 1 fire damage to the source of that damage.

name: Son of Flame
rules: Ferocity; Son of Flame can't be dealt fire damage. When the last Son of Flame leaves play, if Ragnaros is Submerged, flip Ragnaros.

name: Flamewaker
rules: 1, Destroy Flamewalker -> Destroy target equipment.

name: Flamewaker Priest
rules: [Exhaust] -> Flamewalker Priest heals 4 damage from target hero or ally. Use only on your turn.

name: Flamewaker Elite
rules: Protector

name: Core Rager
rules: Protector; At the end of your turn, ready Core Rager.

name: Flamewaker Healer
rules: [Exhaust] -> Flamewalker Healer deals 1 shadow damage to each hero and ally in target opponent's party.

name: Lava Spawn
rules: At the start of your turn, put a Lava Spawn into play.

name: Flamewaker Protector
rules: [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target ready ally. That ally deals melee damage equal to its ATK to ist controller's hero. Use only on your turn.
